description: A member of the Infinities from the United States Army 65th Combat Training Group. He is Sharon`s boyfriend after previously having a romantic relationship with Yuuya. He and Yuuya were classmates at the same institution and is Japanese-American like Yuuya. But unlike Yuuya, he embraces his Japanese heritage while Yuuya despises it. Leon has become hateful towards Yuuya ever since the accident that killed Rick Sven.
name: Leon Kuze
